definition: characterized by an asexual reproductive processes in plants
details:
adjective
- characterized by an asexual reproductive processes in plants
= example: characterized by an asexual reproductive processes in plants
- relating to involuntary bodily functions
= example: relating to involuntary bodily functions
- composed of vegetation or plants
= example: composed of vegetation or plants
- of or relating to an activity that is passive and monotonous
= example: of or relating to an activity that is passive and monotonous
- lacking any cognitive function, including any awareness of oneself or the outside world
= example: lacking any cognitive function, including any awareness of oneself or the outside world
